name: Cosmic Blossom
description:
Cosmic Blossom is a first-person cosmic sandbox.

As you run and jump through the procedural map, you throw seeds which turn into trees, which create even more trees and so on...! 

This is a remake of Cosmic Bloom aka Comic Boom.

Cosmic Blossom was originally created in <24h during #procjam / #7dfps, Dec 2020.

twitter @zolarsys
